Texts.Chs: 由于你是一名待命的同志，也许你可​​以^green;回到前哨站并与^orange;造船厂的企鹅皮特^reset;交谈？整整一周他一直在抱怨一些事情。
Texts.Eng: Since you're an active agent, maybe you could ^green;return to the Outpost and speak to ^orange;Penguin Pete the shipyard captain^reset;? He's been ranting about something for a solid week.

Texts.Chs: 这可不是一般的壮举 - 干得好，亲爱的。现在我们等待当有关您成就的消息传开时，就可以正式开始^green;重现我们的荣光^reset;了！
Texts.Eng: That was no mean feat - well done, dear. Now we can truly begin to ^green;rebuild our ranks^reset; when word spreads about what you accomplished!

Texts.Chs: ^green;探索^orange;厄尔吉斯水晶装运公司^reset;。
